Headline: Temporary Northbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Reroute near South Blvd/Ridgeland
ShortDescription:
Northbound 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via due to, 
 near South Blvd/Ridgeland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via South Blvd, Scoville, Lake, Ridgeland, and resume normal route due to street blockage near South Blvd/Ridgeland.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
